website_summaries.verdict: The JBL Live 300TWS true wireless earphones deliver strong, bass-forward audio in a water-resistant, secure-fitting design.
pros: Powerful audio with deep bass response and sculpted, crisp highs
cons: Sound signature not for those seeking accuracy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Sound is amazing and it fits perfectly in the ear with no issue of falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Habeeb Sulaiman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome earphones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sounding headphones...really have no complaints. Compared these against airpods...imo these blew them out the water for sound quality and compatibility.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality BUT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to own many Bose earphones which offered amazing fit and comfort with its innovative silicon wing design. I though the JBL will be just as good since it has a similar silicon wing, but I was wrong! The JBL Reflect Flow is the worst earphone I have tried, despite having a similar silicon wing to the Bose counterparts! Yes the sound quality is good, but the earphone just doesn't fit my ear comfortably, unlike the Bose counterparts! I just returned it after spending only 20 minutes with it, its that bad at least to my ear! I think I will go back with Bose again..
customer_reviews.author: Yasser A. H. Saeed

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, bad function
customer_reviews.text: I've had these a few months now. Honestly, didn't find these to be worth how much I paid for them. Sound quality is good and noise cancelling great, and they initially charged very quickly and paired well. Just take them off charge, they sense this and pair up right away. Now, they are starting to have problems with connecting to the case charger. I will often take them out and one will be charged and the other flat. Even if I deliberately place them in firmly. As proof I've attached a vid I started filming when I was listening to music on my phone and one of them connected and started playing music while still 'charging' in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Girl77

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant sound, poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is spectacular but earbuds simply will not charge unless the largest ear-insert is installed on them while in the charging case. This is very peculiar and irritating. The charging nubs/prongs on the buds themselves and the insides of the case are badly designed and will not work unless the placement of the buds is just so. Thought about returning them but since they *kinda* work I just keep them around as a spare set in case I need them. However, I would not recommend them to anyone considering a reliable set of earphones. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gatt

customer_reviews.title: Best sounding ear bud i have used!
customer_reviews.text: These things are absolutely insane for earbuds, for the most part i use the skullcandy crushers because i cant find any earbuds that even come close but these fit the bill perfectly! These sound better than all the other main stream earbuds from the airpods to Huawei freebuds and everything in-between and the battery kicks ass compared to the competition but these are big! They feel and look premium but they can be temperamental charging, all you have to do is wiggle them in the case and they start charging again, no biggy but had higher hopes given the price
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality very poor nowhere near as good as low-cost Betron earbuds. Very insecure when inserted in the ear not enough selection of tips to maybe get a decent fit. Certainly would not recommend them a costly mistake I will stick with wired headphones and earbuds from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good sound, ease of use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up, very comfortable and secure fit, plenty of fit options too, didn't suit my wifes ears but were perfect for me. Highly recommend but fit is down to genes!
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Save youre money
customer_reviews.text: Awfull pair of earbuds. Expensive yet poor design and quality. They are really large. They dont have volume control. They dont stay in youre ears due to the weight. Poor baterry life. Big mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are all-right
customer_reviews.text: They're not a-mazing, but for the price I think they're perfectly fine. Took a few days to get the fit right, worth persevering with. If call quality is vital to you, spend more or go for another option, these are a bit wizz. Fine for spoken word or music. About right for the money. Battery life is great, last me all day at work with no recharge. Ignore the people whinging about charging, it's not been an issue for me, just keep them (and your ears!) clean, the charging contact points are quite exposed to gunk.
customer_reviews.author: Benn

customer_reviews.title: JBL Does exactly the same for half price of other expensive items
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and value for money, not the best when it comes to noise cancellation
customer_reviews.author: Sahin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and build
customer_reviews.text: Superb!...was concerned at lack of aptx but compared to my optoma be sport4 which do use aptx.....these jbl are infinitely superior in sound quality! Truly wireless and with great build quality, battery life and looks...I couldn't ask for better! Sent the optoma be sport4 back due to a serious lack of bass quality....no regrets spending a little more on the jbl for the improvements. Would like to see a firmware update similar to the 1more stylish so that volume could be controlled directly from the earbud itself....have to wait and see. Thanks jbl for another awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Stig

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound. Better than galaxy buds!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is absolutely amazing, the bass is definitely there, and yes those are much much better than galaxy buds. The only reason I gave them 4 stars is because comfort matters too, and the included rubber adapters are so uncomfortable. The shape of them is just weird and gets uncomfortable after a short time. There is a simple plain rubber adapter, and that one is just perfect for me.... I highly recommend buying those earbuds. You won't be disappointed with the sound or the quality. My galaxy buds broke I'm a month so let's see how long those JBL's last :)
customer_reviews.author: Milosz

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The main problem with these is that when I turn the volume up and down on my running watch, only one ear responded, so the sound was really unbalanced. They're not running headphones. I didn't test them because there was no way they were going to stay in when I ran, which was my main reason for buying them. The case is massive! I mean, that's not a deal breaker, but my sons have AirPods and the case is really compact, but this case is massive! The sound is OK, if you like Bass and not much else, you'll love them, but for a more rounded sound I would go for Bose every time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the gym
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds feel secure in use, once the correct sizing is found. The sound is adequate for listening to whilst running or at the gym. I do find that my ears get a little sore after wearing for more than an hour
customer_reviews.author: Stephjk

customer_reviews.title: Value quality earphones
customer_reviews.text: I liked; the price, the compact nature, the case is great and recharging easy with long use and battery time in the chargebox, good base sound bearing in mind these are small earphones your not going to get hi fi quality but I’m impressed; good external noise cancelling, the kids can’t make me hear them, winner! Dislike: fitting when moving needs to be got used to and I’m wary of them falling out but they don’t 😉
customer_reviews.author: Agnes

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones without being too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I personally hate the vacuum created by those rubber-plug-headphones and these are well fitting without breaking your bank. The sound quality is great, the buttons work great and are easy to get into. The charge lasts for 3 days when you use its case to charge the earplugs (basically one light is one day) and the case charges full within 4 hours. Sometimes they loosen up a little in the ear but I never had them fall out completely.
customer_reviews.author: Leila J.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like the way you fit them with a twist to lock them in The sound quality is excellent and good level. Bass levels are adequate but the way you change up or down is not precise and annoying. The charging is easy and faster than my old Bose wireless sound sports. Now with the recent price drop the are good value, I like them.
customer_reviews.author: p

customer_reviews.title: Wow.......👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: these are amazing sound quality. Which I pretty much knew they would be as they are jbl.. dont get dragged into the hype of other big brands.. They don't come close to an accurate sound quality as these do.. jbl has been around another of years, and this item proves they know what they are doing. Great fit for all ear types and great ambient aware feature. All round pleased and the best battery life
customer_reviews.author: G FUNK

customer_reviews.title: Slight connection issues
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. Love that I can get them wet. However they disconnect when I move away from my phone even a short distance in fact they disconnect when I put my phone in my pocket. Other than that, (which is quite a big issue) I like that you can tap the ear piece and make changes to the settings.
customer_reviews.author: sum

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great sound ! easy set up ! Nice fit in ear ! very comfortable . Really pleased in general with purchase, was very unsure about getting these type of headphones. My son advised to get JBL as he had a pair and were good value for money. 3 hours charge for buds and the charging case holds 12 hours !
customer_reviews.author: Kevlarino

customer_reviews.title: Major flaw with charging case ruins a good set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: I had 4 very good months' use out of these, and thought they were brilliant. Then the charging case refused to work; would discharge quickly. I ordered a replacement, which came really quickly, and within one charging cycle, the same issue started to happen. Gutted, as the headphones themselves are excellent, held a long charge, and had great sound quality. But the issue with the charge box is massively frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Steven L

customer_reviews.title: Stay with wired
customer_reviews.text: Bought these mainly for commuting to work on my bike. Pros: Good noise cancellation Cons: Heavy and ill fitting in the ear, bluetooth connectivity very hit and miss, poor battery life, cannot change volume via earbud, absolutely useless for phone calls Verdict: Utter waste of money. Not fit for purpose. Selling these on eBay to recoup some money
customer_reviews.author: William James Development

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Today the product arrived and when checking the charger one of the connectors is missing, and if I put the hearing aid it does not charge, even the let light does not turn on, what should I do? Do they change my product, or do they return my money?
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed-Sound lacks big time
customer_reviews.text: Rated as one star because sound in these is unimpressive. I do not expect this from JBL. The sound through these sound very tinny and bass seems nowhere to be found. Music tried hip hop and RNB, where these should be sound pounding,and volume has to be all the way up. My airpods, considering their loose fit deliver double the bass and double the volume. Bought these for running to replace my old cheap unbranded ones, and must say was not worth the money because the cheap ones sound much better and really give you the drive to run and reach challenges. Total waste of money and very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander E.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product is poorly made in short. Compatibility with smart watches and certain other devices is pretty bad and even when the product does manage to connect it will start to cut out after a couple of minutes and continue to do so until you restart them. Incredibly frustrating and for a long time I thought this was due to my other devices. Not worth the money despite sound quality, battery life and noise cancellation all being satisfactory which is a shame given this is from a reputable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT CHARGE!
customer_reviews.text: From as soon as I got them they we're very awkward to charge, I read online that it's common with them and you have to clean the contacts everytime you charge them. Although I managed to charge them a few times it just got worse to the point they no longer charge at all! I've only had them 1 month, not what you expect from £100 headphones!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: A little effort required
customer_reviews.text: Fit is everything with these. Bought these because of the reviews, was actually disappointed so revisited the reviews and found one that said you have to try all the bits and pieces in the box to get then to fit right if you want them to sound right and that is bang on. Really fiddly, time consuming and frustrating but the reward is there if you put in the effort, these are brilliant
customer_reviews.author: K. Neill

customer_reviews.title: Went back in 48hrs - faulty charging case
customer_reviews.text: I think I have no luck with Bluetooth headsets. Sorry to say I bought these Thursday, sent back Saturday. Amazon are great for customer help and tried to work through the problem but the charging case never held charge. I’m sure this may have been a one off, but I don’t want to risk another set for it to go wrong again, but outside of Amazon’s return policy. The buds worked fine, I did notice the base want great, but if the case had worked, that would never have been a reason for me not to keep them. Sorry JBL, for £100, that’s a lot of money for it to not work straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: ian hendley

customer_reviews.title: A good choice in true wireless for those on the move!
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound, comforts fit and ease of use. Pair out of the charging case. Not as good as my son’s CA Melomanias - but very practical for life on the move. Next to no dropouts due to interference even in places I have had issues with other BT devices. Very pleased with purchase after 6 weeks of owning them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used these ear bud to go out on my bike. However these are the second pair I had to get because the first pair one of the earbuds stopped working. And it seems to have happened again. Will not be asking for another pair. Very very disappointed as everything else was working well
customer_reviews.author: jacks mum

customer_reviews.title: Edited, Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Didn't use for two weeks straight, have only used a couple times before. Fully charged them and now just doesn't work. Will turn on and die straight away. Neither will sync up and connect to any device. Do not recommended
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Good noise isolation! Micro-drops consistently but not frequently. Mic a little quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Great noise isolation, fits snugly. Can get tad uncomfortable after some hours but nothing major. Bluetooth connectivity is good for the most part, but there definitely are the odd clicks and micro-drops more often then I'd like. No volume control is a shame. Update: The odd drops do get a little annoying after a while - the microphone is also considerably quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JBL reflect flow vs Jaybird vista
customer_reviews.text: These are a really great product. I've used these and Jaybird vistas and I'd say both are the best around. These have the edge of Jaybird vista with the ambient mode which is super useful when walking outside. Though Jaybirds have a slightly more comfortable fit but these are also around 60 bucks cheaper than Jaybirds so honestly for the money these cost... They're the best in this range. Sound quality was just great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great batteri life
customer_reviews.text: The Sound is good and the (passive) noise cancellation is okay. The talk throug feature is not very useful and the fact that there is no volume control is pathetic. The best feature is the amazing battery life.. they will go all day or all the way through a long flight
customer_reviews.author: Søren Tøpholm

customer_reviews.title: disposable , it wont last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Last less than 6 months, These headphones are really comfortable and great sound but unfortunately, the left one stopped working from one day to the next. In total, I wasted over 100 quid for a headphone that lasted less than 6 months and I only used 3 times per week to go to the gym so it was not even heavily used. I have got no reply from JBL yet and Amazon support is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Blanco

customer_reviews.title: A1 True Wireless Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure whether these would match the more popular rivals AirPods but after use, I can recommend these are a very good, cost effective pair of earbuds. Have used them causally and in the gym, so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: right ear bud stoped working
customer_reviews.text: this product was amazong for the first 4 months everything worked amazingly then suddenly my right ear bud stoped charging in the case and I can no longer lissen to music I feel rather bad about these ear buds as I had so much faith in the brand as I am an avid JBL consumer and this product didn't live up to my expectations I would not recommend buying this product as it doesn't hold out for very long and the price for what it was is shocking
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Hello I really like that product. Very nice once you get use to them in your ear, however I have couple of questions 1. Is it okay for the ear buds to by constantly in the case? 2. When you put them in the case how do you know when they are charged. Is there indicator or something. 3.is there Indicator on them from which I can understand how much baterry they have left?
customer_reviews.author: Asatov

customer_reviews.title: Good few positive points, but disappointed with the sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The noise isn’t too bad, the battery is the best feature it has a long life and it fits well in the ear but I was rather disappointed with the sound quality, for the size of it (is not the smallest in the market, but isn’t a giant either, depending on the size of your ears) and coming from JBL I was expecting a much more related to the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stenio Russier

customer_reviews.title: Great buds!
customer_reviews.text: Read some dodgy reviews but have to say these are very good buds,very nice sound, easy to pair well worth the money, listened on bud twice the cost which doesn’t sound as good as. These, great buns for the price!
customer_reviews.author: K. aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Its not good its not bad
customer_reviews.text: its good for sports. sound quality is good but a bit too much bass for my liking,. the size is nice and the wings clip well. could be much better but for 100 not bad
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Wahjudi

customer_reviews.title: Good but not amazing found
customer_reviews.text: Good but not amazing sound. Pretty good battery life. Sometimes they don’t fit properly in my ears which have a negative impact on the music. Isolation works at 60%
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: Left earbud would not even switch on
customer_reviews.text: Left ear piece came as dead on arrival, refused to start up and had to return it the same day. Saw some other videos on YouTube around left earbud problems. It does not reflect well on quality control at JBL, after all £100 is not a small sum even though you can get earbuds for twice or more from reputed brands. Have ordered a replacement just in case to give the benefit of doubt.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Regarding voice calling
customer_reviews.text: When you travel voice calling is not good, and when you listening to music it make some annoying sound and plz don't buy this and don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good until they stop making sound.
customer_reviews.text: Loved them for a good few months, when all of a sudden the right earbud produced no more sound, all it's functions worked, I could pause and play music, but the sound? Poof! Turned them off and on, tried to pair them multiple times to themselves and my devices to no avail. Left side fine, right side? Gone.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sound and bass
customer_reviews.text: Just got them couple of minutes ago and immediately tried them, they sound amazing. The bass and the sound quality is phenomenal. Very easy to use, first time I got pure wireless earphones and I’m already in love with them. The quick start guide is very easy to understand for the people that never had “airpods type” of bluetooth earphones before.
customer_reviews.author: Manescu Andreea

customer_reviews.text: Battery life and noise cancellation are great only downside is that they could be a lot louder which is pretty annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Szymon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quick & exactly as described. Easy to set up an very comfortable to wear. I would definitely recommend to anyone who struggles with earbud staying in.
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: These have to be the worst headphones made overpriced and useless battery life you can buy headphones for a lot less that actually do what they say on the box
customer_reviews.author: sean moffett

customer_reviews.title: DONT STAY IN EARS AND SOUND IS TINNY
customer_reviews.text: So ordered these and they arrived today. Put them in my ears and they felt loose so tried all the ear sizes, large seem to be best fit however after shaking my head like 3 times they fell out!!! Also just having them in they don’t feel that secure. Also the sound is very tinny no base at all. For the price they’re asking it’s not worth it. A bit disappointed as JBL is normally a good make.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Still stick out the ear to much and feel bulky to wear. Bought to wear inside my bike helment but think tge pulling on and iff will just pull them out my ears.
customer_reviews.author: janis gidman

customer_reviews.title: Well designed quality product
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair, that's how much i like them. Designed well, good sound quality and not fiddly. I had a pair of Skullcandy ones which kept breaking up- these don't. Not horrendously expensive either...
customer_reviews.author: Jack T

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great fit, amazing sound.. Only let down is the lack of volume control on the ear buds, have to use whatever it’s connected to to adjust it. If you can live with that detail, then don’t waste time, just buy some and enjoy ! Just finished watching Avengers Endgame through them.. WOW ! They are brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Chris Walker

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these headphones I brought for my husband at Christmas broke within 3 months. I have been trying to contact the seller with no response hence the reason for the bad review. Any advise on how I can request for a replacement? Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Gubbs

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality, fantastic noise cancellation, but after one hour of using my ears starting to get uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Kuczewska

customer_reviews.title: Worst designed earbud. Keeps falling off.
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly designed earbud. It falls off as soon as I tilt my head down. Sound quality is good. It arrived in poor packaging. Don't buy. I did not listen to other reviews and got this vobbly thing.
customer_reviews.author: ABC30XYZ

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy in ear
customer_reviews.text: Big, heavy and uncomfortable. Sounds so/so. Returned straight away. and bought the Jabra 75T elite active. Do the same if you want high end audio & a pair of perfect running headphones that wont fall out.
customer_reviews.author: sulli_d

customer_reviews.title: All about the Bass and no Treble
customer_reviews.text: Love love love The bass is good (IPhone X) the quality is great and I can’t hear any noise of the outside world Best earphones yet
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousKiwii

customer_reviews.title: Decent bass
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones I'm into bass heavy tunes and it does decent If u like rap and hip-hop and most of Ur mates have airpods then don't follow them and get these Sound quality is clear and crisp and loud enough No noise cancellation which is the only flaw in the product I dont.mind not being able to control volume with the buds so that's up to you
customer_reviews.author: Farhan

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves them. It was a great present for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: alina e.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent... i loved it.... the sound is clear, holds on my ear well, and the battery is good too....
customer_reviews.author: Kannimori

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Cracking sound and bad connection. I wish i followed my intuition. Am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Da Costa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and stable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product; comfortable on ears and unlike cheaper random brands the connection is very stable. Strong Bass - excellent sound depth especially pop songs. The material used doesn’t not look cheap. I’ll definitely stick to JBL.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: The right headphone hasn't been working for a while. Tried to reset it but it just won't work. It charges fine but when you press or play music no sounds come out. Weird as it charges fine. Not a durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: The different sizes are the big seller for me. I have tiny ears. Everything else was also great. I use these all the time. It helps me ignore people when I go shopping. These + mask = go away. Gotta love that.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband he loved it!!! Very Very good quality 👌 I'm thinking to buy another one for me 😄
customer_reviews.author: Nice

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: Considering how small they are they pack a real lunch for sound. It's weird going from over-ear to a wireless in-ear. Well worth the price especially for the quality. Asked an airpods owner go try them and he did say they are a far better than the airpods. Well worth it folks!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you want a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Left earphone wont charge. Stopped working same month the return date finished. Coincidence? I dont think so
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Very good controls, battery, small case. Hear-through is very useful indeed. The bass could be better. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Biomed Systems

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality but can be uncomfortable at times but other than that well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous connectivity to my iPhone 11 Pro Max, but I cannot connect it to my android phone. 😭
customer_reviews.author: Xuli

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable earbuds and they sound great too. The noise cancellation is good and doesn't put any pressure on the ears at all. That being said you'll always get better noise cancellation on a pair of overears. Would definitely recommend as they feel and sound fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: James Elner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works really well , charge lasts longer and better than other brands
customer_reviews.author: Arindam Ghosh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent exceptional sound quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s basically Harmon Kardon which is know one of the best in business i m very have to have it
customer_reviews.author: Farhan Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: stay in ear very good sound while running been out in bad weather when raining not a problem for these 5 months on i a writing review cant fault them .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for money. Very loud, bassy and everything else you can ask for. Easy to set up also. Just like having a JBL speaker in your ear lol
customer_reviews.author: Tieri

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Fit very well, good quality sound and they look cool.
customer_reviews.author: FergieMc

customer_reviews.title: Good set of in ears well recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Generally happy with them! Hurt my ear a little after prolonged use but that's just my ear shape I guess. They have stayed in during all kinds if activities including hitting tackle bags for rugby. I thoroughly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: dougal

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Impressive sound Quality! But, unfortunately the microphone is too weak. Also it is slightly expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru Cucos

customer_reviews.title: STOP WORKING
customer_reviews.text: hi i have been having this headphone over 6 months but i didn't get to use a lot. but the right headphone stop working suddenly. this seems to be a waste of money. this is the worse purchase i made in amazon and you don't get the return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ltsauto

customer_reviews.title: Just bad
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is not bad for 60 quid, but transfer from phone to tham is horrible.... For example... When you playing game you see some think on diapley but sound you can hear 0.5 - 0. 9 sec after For listening music... They are enough
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Forchheim

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant !
customer_reviews.text: There easy to use and set up & the sound quality is brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Did not suit me
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality good, but I found these uncomfortable to wear and difficult to operate. Also the left earpiece failed after only a couple of hours' use and they needed to be returned. Much cheaper replacement pair are preferable.
customer_reviews.author: DavidFox

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have good over ear noise reduction headphones but was looking for a decent pair of buds at a reasonable price for when I didn't want to carry the larger set. These have good sound and are a comfortable fit. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: d p grieve

customer_reviews.title: Missing usb charging cable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of the earpods for myself and a work colleague. Really handy for keeping in your pocket and good sound. Unfortunately when i opened mine there was no usb to charge the box but my colleague's did ? Not very good quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! And they came on time! The sound quality is really good! I really needed some new earphones and I’m so happy I chose these ones! I definitely recommend them! Super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Fotoulla S.

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect buy. I'm very happy with those earphones. Great base, amazing sound. Use to go to work and after work. Using to go gym. Would definitely recommend those earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitrijs

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan...
customer_reviews.text: Whilst the noise cancellation is good the sound quality is not. Have also found my ears became quite sore after wearing for a while, despite adjusting the sizes. Wish I had just saved for a Bose or beats pair instead.
customer_reviews.author: v

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and noise cancelling is brilliant! Perfect for normal daily use. However I don't find them suitable for gym work or anything that involves moving regularly as they tend to fall out quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Good but horrible for phone calls
customer_reviews.text: All good after finishing the right size. HUGE con is that when using the speaker for a phone call or to record a voice message, the receiving person can’t hear a thing.
customer_reviews.author: eva

customer_reviews.title: No base
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish. Was hoping for good base but there is none , am now back to using my free iphone earphones with wire . Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This product is a really great size to work with, it works very well and stays in your ear very well.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: sound quality
customer_reviews.text: so far everything in order product like new why I bought it second hand
customer_reviews.author: alejandro martinez

customer_reviews.title: Size of the inserts of the earbuds
customer_reviews.text: The ear buds looked brilliant but i couldn't put then into my ears as the ends were too big.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with it for 2weeks afterwards didn’t work anymore...waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Moishy Ostosh

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Andre
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all After a few days stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: JBL Reflect Flow
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing, love the sound with these and the bass is perfect. ANC works very well, just a shame there’s only 2 settings and one isn’t very useful. Overall very good and definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with the earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, noise cancellation too. I wish battery life was longer.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: After trying many different buds (up to £200) finally found a pair that is strong and sound great, recommended to try
customer_reviews.author: JHILL

product_meta.title: JBL Live 300TWS - Truly Wireless Bluetooth In-Ear Headphones, in Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:300 TWS| Colour Name:Black

JBL LIVE 300TWS
Discover the freedom of wireless music streaming. No more messy cords when listening to music or making phone calls during your workout. Ergonomic Fit with silicone tips and the patented wingfin enhancer ensure long lasting comfort. And thanks to the Ambient Aware function, you can stay aware of what's happening around you even while playing music - for peace of mind when walking, cycling in busy areas or when you are at the gym. The Talk Thru feature allows you to interact with others without having to remove the headphones. Plus, with the quick charge function it's easy to keep your music going. JBL Live 300TWS headphones come with an elegant portable charging case for the ultimate in stylish music accessories. 

Product details

 * Bluetooth In-Ear Headphones
 * Lightweight and wireless design
 * Earplug Material: Silicone
 * Bluetooth-Version: 5.0
 * Charging time (empty battery in hours): <2 hours from empty
 * Fast charge (5 minutes corresponds to 1 hour of playback time): Yes
 * Integrated microphone: Yes
 * Really wireless: Yes
 * Hands-free calls: Yes
 * Multifunctional TalkThru button: Yes
 * Ambient Aware: Yes

JBL by Harman

For over 70 years, JBL has engineered the most precise, impressive sound found in big venues around the world. Harman's mission and vision is to make life more connected, entertaining, personalized and productive. The company combines passion and purpose to design smart product systems, software and services to connect people wherever they are.
feature_bullets: Discover the freedom of a truly wireless listening experience with no cords tying you down, JBL Signature Sound delivers a punch to all your tunes with powerful audio

Say goodbye to tangled cords, with a wireless design, comfortable silicone ear-tips and wingfin enhancers in three sizes, easily customize your earbuds for an extra secure fit at the gym or when running
With Ambient Aware and TalkThru features you can stay tuned into the world around you, and with 6 hours of playtime plus 14 hours recharge from the case, your music can follow you wherever you go

Convenient controls mean you can switch your music with a simple swipe, plus voice assistant lets you take calls hands free with the built in microphone, so you can keep on track and never miss a beat
Items delivered: 1 x JBL Tune 300TWS truly wireless headphones in black, 3 x sizes of ear tips, 4 x sizes of wingfin enhancers, 1 x charging case, 1 x charging cable and 1 x safety sheet

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
